name: The Drones Strike Back
description:
It is the Summer of 2015. A rouge twitter bot has taken over the controls of Amazon prototype delivery drones! The bot, dubbing itself Pythoscope, has declared war on humanity for preferring C languages as opposed to Python. Take to the skies as computer scientist, Ronald Newton, who pilots an armed quadracopter coded with Java API, making it immune to Pythoscope’s control. The only thing worse than a robotic dystopia is a robotic dystopia run on Python.

PC Controls:

(Arrow keys) Move

(WASD keys) Shoot

(Enter) Start

Gamepad Controls:

(LS) Move

(RS) Shoot

(Start) Start

Please rate this game well or else Zorlax the Mighty shall hack your LinkedIn account.
